Outcome Description: Total productivity gains measured in hours, categorized into baseline, target, and current values for input preparation, output generation frequency, and processing time.
Measured by the number of users adopting standardized processes or automation across teams, regions, and time zones.
Quantified by the number of audit risks remediated.
Reported as one-time annual dollar savings from cost avoidance, cost reduction, or revenue generation.
Indicate if the solution can sustain changes in process, people and systems.
